definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn

sentences.english: Adjust valves, ratchets, seals, brake linings and other components.
sentences.chinese: 調整閥門，棘輪，密封件，剎車片和其他組件。

sentences.english: I describe an upward ratcheting mechanism which triggers an "educational cascade."
sentences.chinese: 我描述其爲一種能引發一場“教育變革”的棘輪機制。

sentences.english: Ratchet hob is commonly used it is, hob.
sentences.chinese: 棘輪滾刀是常用的定裝滾刀。

sentences.english: By utilizing the irreversibility of the rotation of the ratchet, the cargo can be tied up.
sentences.chinese: 利用棘輪旋轉的不可逆轉性即可把貨物捆牢。

sentences.english: Switching between the two games seemed to create a ratchet-like effect.
sentences.chinese: 在兩個遊戲中切換似乎產生了類似棘輪的效應。
